comment: Prof Brown is pretty easy, but takes no excuses. She is fair in her paper grades, as long as you follow assignment guidelines. She loves writing and teaches you to love it also ... or at least tolerate it enough to pass. Wish I had had her for 1102 as well!

Pretty easy class! There are multiple papers, but they are graded easily and if you need help Ms. Brown is always willing to help. Overall, it was an easy class and I enjoyed having Ms. Brown as a professor.
She was really helpful and a really easy grader. I think I am going to take her for ENG 1102 also!!
She was so nice and so helpful. It's a great transition class to take as a freshman to get used to college. All her lectures are really interesting and funny too!
